attributes.documentation:
@dev Contract module which provides a basic access control mechanism, where
there is an owner that can be granted exclusive access to
specific functions.
 * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier
`onlyOwner`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to
the owner, and the modifier `onlyManager`, which can be applied to your
functions to restrict their use to the manager.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than a manager.
attributes.name: onlyManager

attributes.documentation: @dev Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.
@dev Returns true if the user(`account`) is the a manager.
attributes.name: isManager

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner_`).
Can only be called by the current owner.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Accepts ownership of the contract.
Can only be called by the settting new owner(`pendingOwner`).
attributes.name: acceptOwnership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "acceptOwnership: only new owner do this."

attributes.type: literal_string "acceptOwnership: only new owner do this."
attributes.value: acceptOwnership: only new owner do this.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Set a new user(`account`) as a manager.
Can only be called by the current owner.
attributes.name: setManager

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "setManager: account cannot be a zero address."

attributes.type: literal_string "setManager: account cannot be a zero address."
attributes.value: setManager: account cannot be a zero address.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Remove a previous manager account.
Can only be called by the current owner.
attributes.name: removeManager

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "removeManager: _account cannot be a zero address."

attributes.type: literal_string "removeManager: _account cannot be a zero address."
attributes.value: removeManager: _account cannot be a zero address.
